channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- CardDAV Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- CardDAV Server

item.title: CVE-2018-8928|2024-09-17T02:37:37.641Z -- synology -- carddav%20server
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Address Book Editor in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.8-0086 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) family_name, (2) given_name, or (3) additional_name parameter.

item.title: CVE-2022-27613|2024-09-17T01:40:51.399Z -- synology -- carddav%20server
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.10-0153 allows remote authenticated users to inject SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
